alert.note: Alert for Gallatin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 09 at 1:51PM MST until January 09 at 2:15PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM MST FOR NORTHEASTERN GALLATIN COUNTY... At 149 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 16 miles north of Belgrade to 8 miles southwest of Manhattan, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow. Gusty winds leading to blowing snow and visibility rapidly falling to less than one-quarter mile. Wind gusts greater than 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Travel will be difficult and potentially dangerous. Interstate 90 from Belgrade to Bozeman Pass will be impacted. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Belgrade, Manhattan, Amsterdam, Four Corners, Bozeman Hot Springs, Church Hill, and Menard. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions. SNOW SQUALL...OBSERVED
